bibl.title: The Keeping of Records at Philadelphia in the Julio-Claudian Period and the "Economic Crisis under Nero".
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Hanson, Ann Ellis

bibl.note: From the viewpoint of the tax rolls from Philadelphia, the "economic crisis under Nero" seems rather an example of prolonged after-effect of natural disasters.
bibl.seg: Hanson Ann Ellis, The Keeping of Records at Philadelphia in the Julio-Claudian Period and the "Economic Crisis under Nero".
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 261-277.
